title: Small Business Case Study
description: Small Businesses can be a great source of organic growth, few see value in blockchain, nor understand how it can solve fundamental problems.
solution: I would like to work with a Small Employee Incentive Company to build a Cardano defi app and create a whitepaper documenting the process.
experience: Former Java developer that worked in the space and has connections to several of these companies. Currently a plutus pioneer and excited!
